data.text:
There is no such thing as a videogame composer……. Do not limit yourself by definition. Great composers that write for games do so because they understand that untethering them to picture, allows them to write with unlimited possibilities. What are your thoughts? #composer #composers #videogames #videogameindustry #music #musicindustry #musicbusiness #musicproducer #podcast

As much as I am pleased with my YouTube channel and its growth, the main motivation is to create an enduring online resource for guitarists and burgeoning musicians. #goodmusemusic #guitar #music #musician #musiceducation #youtube #youtubechannel #podcast

Have you checked out our YouTube channel yet? We think you should! There are bloopers everywhere! Click the link https://buff.ly/3XdYTxH , and go subscribe to our YouTube channel #shorts #YouTube #sharethemusic #music #conversations #turnonthemusic #podcast
